name: Embedder
long_description:
Embedder is an AI coding agent that can write and test firmware on real hardware. 

General-purpose coding agents can't read documentation, respect timing requirements, or interact with test equipment, resulting in plausible-looking code that is functionally useless on a real device.

Embedder builds a hardware model by indexing datasheets, schematics, reference manuals, and errata. It then closes the loop by connecting directly to your physical tools (debuggers, serial ports, logic analyzers and oscilloscopes) to autonomously test and validate the firmware it generates in the real world.
